law.catch_line: Intentional refusal or failure to provide information prohibited.

text.section: No person, insurer or authorized agency shall intentionally or knowingly refuse to release any information requested pursuant to KRS 304.20-160(1) or (3).
No person or insurer shall intentionally or knowingly refuse or fail to provide authorized agencies relevant information pursuant to KRS 304.20-160(2).
No person or insurer shall fail to hold in confidence information required to be held in confidence by KRS 304.20-170.

law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
